component.text: Complete this crossword puzzle based on VPN information discussed in this topic.
Correct. You have identified the characteristics of VPN technology, devices, and toplogies.
Incorrect. Please review the topic and try the crossword again. As a hint, no spaces should be entered for multiple word answers.

Down
1 Tunneling protocol developed by Cisco Systems that supports secure virtual private dial-up networks at Layer 2 (3 words)
2 High-performance encryption algorithm that uses a 56-bit symmetric key (3 words)
4 A strong security algorithm that uses key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits. (3 words)
6 An asymmetrical key cryptosystem using key length of 512, 768, 1024 bits or larger (acronym)
10 A framework of open standards providing encryption, authentication, security algorithms, or keying technology (acronym)

Across
3 A hash algorithm that uses a 160-bit shared secret key (3 words)
5 A public key exchange method used to establish a shared secret key over an unsecured channel (2 words)
7 Encapsulates packets inside IP tunnels between endpoints without confidentiality (3 words)
8 IETF tunneling solution used to tunnel Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP) through a public networks (3 words)
9 A encryption algorithm using 64-bit blocks that are processed three times (acronym)
11 Developed by Microsoft to enable voluntary VPNs for Windows clients (acronym)
12 A hash algorithm that uses a 128-bit shared secret key (2 words)
